about_the_game:
Includes the Shape Of The World Original Soundtrack, both in MP3 & WAV format.

Tracklist


  • 1) Triangle Sun
  • 2) Valley
  • 3) Shore
  • 4) Cove
  • 5) Swamp
  • 6) Woodlands
  • 7) Rai forest
  • 8) Caves
  • 9) Mountain
  • 10) Summit
  • 11) The Water on Stone (Cove Alt)
  • 12) Skyfish (Rainforest Alt)
  • 13) Wind Tunnel (Caves Alt)

The Soundtrack will be placed in your Shape of the World folder in the Steam Directory: …Steam\SteamApps\common\Shape of the World[/i]
